suppress.notes: Karate does not expose the server docs in armeria-1.26.2.jar which contain the vulnerable package in file name: armeria-1.26.2.jar: main.fa7e131ea46419c5ac7b.js.gz: main.fa7e131ea46419c5ac7b.js
Only applies to running Glassfish in older JDKs
We do not use the affected reports and they do not accept date inputs so would not expose the vulnerability found in file: karate-core-1.5.0.RC2.jar: vis.min.js
